title: Rotary Connection Feat. Minnie Riperton - Songs + Hey, Love (199
description: The BGP subsidiary of Ace paired two of Rotary Connection's albums onto one disc in 1998. The following year, Raven would combine Aladdin and Dinner Music on one disc. Not only do the original albums deserve to be released separately, but both the BGP and Raven reissue two-fers ruin the strange sleeve artwork that adorned the original LPs. Songs/Hey Love looks particularly horrid, with an orgy of rainbow colors that bleed into each other. Charly once issued Songs on its own, but as of 2003, this combination was the only way to obtain Hey Love on CD. Despite these problems, it might be a dirty secret that these two albums on one disc make for a great introduction to the group. (AMG) https://i.imgur.com/5RaeDXF.jpg 01. Respect [3:07] 02. The Weight [3:26] 03. Sunshine Of Your Love [5:08] 04. I Got My Mojo Working [2:34] 05. The Burning Of The Midnight Lamp [4:41] 06. Tales Of Brave Ulysses [4:32] 07. This Town [3:28] 08. We're Going Wrong [3:23] 09. The Salt Of The Earth [5:00] 10. If I Sing My Song [3:41] 11. The Sea & She [3:32] 12. I Am The Black Gold Of The Sun [5:47] 13. Hangin' Round The Bee Tree [3:42] 14. Hey, Love [4:11] 15. Love Has Fallen On Me [4:20] 16. Song For Everyman [5:33] 17. Love Is [5:20] 18. Vine Of Happiness [4:03] Rotary Connection: Sidney Barnes, Minnie Ripperton, John Stocklin, Kenny Venegas, Bobby Simms, Jerimiah, Mitch Aliota. Producer - Charles Stepney Recorded at Ter Mar Studios, Chicago Label: BGP Records Released: 1998 Catalogue: CDBGP 115 Codec: Flac Compression Level: 6 Quality: High CD-rip by alekow (EAC and Flac) Covers Included (600dpi) Enjoy, Seed and Share
